required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Trial of SHR-1802 in Patients With Failure of Standard Treatment for Advanced Malignant Tumours
clinical_study.official_title: Tolerability, Safety and Pharmacokinetic Characteristics of SHR-1802 in Patients With Advanced Malignancy: a Phase I Clinical Study

brief_summary.textblock: This is the first study to test SHR-1802 in humans. The primary purpose of this study is to see if SHR-1802 is safe and tolerable for patients with locally advanced/unresectable or metastatic malignancies that are refractory to available therapy or for which no standard therapy is available.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of patients with adverse events
secondary_outcome.time_frame: from the first drug administration to within 90 days for the last SHR-1802 dose

secondary_outcome.measure: Rates of dose suspension, dose reduction and dose discontinuation caused by investigational drug related adverse events
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At pre-defined intervals from initial dose up to 24 months
At pre-defined intervals from initial dose up to 24 months
At pre-defined intervals from initial dose up to 24 months
At pre-defined intervals from initial dose up to 24 months
At pre-defined intervals from initial dose up to 24 months
At pre-defined intervals from initial dose through final study visit (up to 24 months)

secondary_outcome.measure: Time of Maximum Concentration (Tmax) of SHR-1802
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At pre-defined intervals from initial dose through final study visit (up to 24 months)

secondary_outcome.measure: Area Under the Curve (AUC) of SHR-1802
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At pre-defined intervals from initial dose through final study visit (up to 24 months)
At pre-defined intervals from initial dose through final study visit (up to 24 months)
At pre-defined intervals from initial dose through final study visit (up to 24 months)

secondary_outcome.measure: Volume of Distribution at Steady State (Vss) of SHR-1802
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At pre-defined intervals from initial dose through final study visit (up to 24 months)

secondary_outcome.measure: Evaluation of the immunogenicity of SHR-1802
secondary_outcome.time_frame: At pre-defined intervals from initial dose through final study visit (up to 24 months)
secondary_outcome.description: Serum sampling to assess the potential for anti-drug antibody (ADA) formation.

intervention.description: This study will evaluate the preliminary safety, tolerability, pharmacokinetic characteristics and initial efficacy of SHR-1802 The goal is to establish the maximum tolerated dose (MTD) and/or recommended Phase 2 dose (RP2D) of sequential escalating doses of SHR-1802 when administered to patients with locally advanced/ unresectable or metastatic malignant tumours that are refractory to available therapy or for which no standard therapy is available.

facility.name: Tianjin Medical University Cancer Institute and Hospital
